abstract: France hopes to spur talks between Israel and Palestinians by pressing United Nations Security Council to adopt resolution laying out parameters and deadline for negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Laurent Fabius, the French foreign minister, said France would consult with other Council members soon over a framework for negotiations.

headline.main: France Seeks U.N. Security Council Resolution on Mideast Talks
headline.print_headline: France to Press U.N. on Talks Between Israel and Palestinians

snippet: Laurent Fabius, the French foreign minister, said France would consult with other Council members soon over a framework for negotiations.
